column4: hi all.... Help needed... can recieve mails on evolution from my gmail account, but can't send..
make sure the security settings are correct, it requires a special encrpytion like TLS or something
the gmail help files will tell you this, use the thunderbird setup for pop3 and smtp
Sending mail : smtp.gmail.com, TLS encryption and make sure your username is in there, and it will ask yuo for a password when sending something
i did as gmail help files.. didn't help
take a screenshot of your outgoing mail preferences and post it on image shack ( this will not include your password,dont worry )
take a screenshot of your outgoing mail preferences and post it on image shack ( this will not include your password,dont worry )
btw, is it possible to recieve mails from yahoo & hotmail as well?
thats what yours should look like
